definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Let's view justice in the large sense.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們以大格局來檢視正義。

sentences.english: Decreased overall still in channels, short-short pattern is unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 總體仍處於下跌通道中，短期空頭格局不變。

sentences.english: Now new forms of biodiesel are starting to change the picture again.
sentences.chinese: 現在新形式的生物燃料又要改變這一格局。

sentences.english: In the article structural configuration, we use the traditional research pattern of special book.
sentences.chinese: 在文章結構佈局上，我們採用傳統的專書研究的格局。

sentences.english: In the long run, every market becomes a two -horse race .
sentences.chinese: 長久觀之，每個市場都是二馬之爭的格局。

sentences.english: The gap distribution patterns are different in different samplings.
sentences.chinese: 不同調查樣點林隙的分佈格局不同。

sentences.english: The house is built on mountains, and in accordance with the level terrain formed a patchwork pattern.
sentences.chinese: 小屋依山而建，並依地勢高低形成了錯落有致的格局。

sentences.english: Finally, we simulated and predicted the spatial distribution pattern of this invasive plant.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對紫莖澤蘭的空間分佈格局進行了模擬和預測。

sentences.english: It has come into the solid traffic layout across sea, land and air.
sentences.chinese: 轄區已形成海陸空立體交叉的交通格局。

sentences.english: The competition structure of the broad-band service market in Shanghai has been formed.
sentences.chinese: 上海寬帶業務運營市場的競爭格局已經形成。

sentences.english: The sharpening administrative department harmonizes , formation grasps simultaneously big patterns of condominium.
sentences.chinese: 加強管理部門協調，形成齊抓共管大格局。

sentences.english: A pattern of all-around and multi-level international S&T cooperation has basically taken shape.
sentences.chinese: 一個全方位，多層次的國際科技合作格局已基本成形。

sentences.english: A pattern of all-round and multi-level international s&t cooperation has basically taken shape .
sentences.chinese: 一個全方位，多層次的國際合作格局已經初步形成。

sentences.english: This had a far-reaching effects on pattern of US-Soviet Cold War and the situation in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 這對美蘇冷戰格局和中東局勢都產生了深遠影響。

sentences.english: All these will make the basis of multiple modes and stratifications of higher education in China.
sentences.chinese: 這將奠定中國多層次和多樣化高等教育格局的基礎。

sentences.english: The building of this house in the shape of the temple was a rich man's vagary.
sentences.chinese: 這個建築物的格局以有錢人的奇想爲形式。

definition: whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
to rise abruptly (to a towering position)/to tower over/to spring up/to emerge suddenly/the emergence (e.g. of a power)
